name: Throw That Yarn
description:
Help Emma get rid of those annoying neighbourhood cats by throwing yarn at them!

Throw That Yarn is a simple and fun arcade cat game where the players have to keep the enemy cats away from their carpet by throwing yarn at them! Make the most points possible by rolling the cats away from you and compete with your friends to see who is the best!

Features:

  • Cute cat action!
  • Several types of cats to deal with;
  • Special power to help you deal with the most annoying cat invasions;
  • Retro inspired art style and realistic yarn physics;
  • Online leaderboards to compete with your friends;
  • Achievements to track your progress as a master cat yarn thrower.

Controls:

  • UP/DOWN to move Emma
  • SPACE to throw yarns
  • X to activate the power
  • SPACE to exit a menu
  • P to pause the game

And take this advice: Beware of the fur ball!
